text: You forgot who you were. I'm just here to remind you.
author: Beautiful Unique Storm

text: They tried to break you, but they built your backbone instead.
author: Beautiful Unique Storm

text: If loving you hurts, then the love is cheap. You deserve luxury treatment, inside and out.
author: Passion

text: Broken women do not stay broken. We rise, we rebuild, and we walk different.
author: Beautiful Unique Storm

text: Act right or move around. My peace is not up for negotiation.
author: Passion
